Talk67:
<sp:3:0:2:0400>Oh no! I was so surprised, I forgot
to smile.
Talk52:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:Greeting_01>All right! We've got a contender!<sp:5:0:0>
Come on, get ready!
Talk53: <sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Greeting_01>That's what I like to hear! Here we go!
Talk68:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think_00>Now that ya know what you're doing, you
should try <clr:0000>Heehl's<clr:ffff> <clr:0000>intermediate course<clr:ffff>.
Talk54:
<sp:3:0:2:0200>The key to havin' fun is preparation.


You can use any bows and arrows you
want and even <clr:0000>modify<clr:ffff> the cart however
you like!
So come try again, and aim for even
greater heights!
Talk69:
<sp:3:0:2:0201>You'll need some arrows for next time.
Here, on the house!
Talk40:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Greeting_01>That's your highest score yet! A good
record earns ya a good smile!
Talk56: <sp:3:0:2:0900>Customer! We got a customer here!<sp:0:4:0>You ready, little brothers? Here we go!
Talk41:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:LaughS_01>And to celebrate our grand opening,
your first ride is free!<sp:5:0:0>
Talk57:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_00>We'll even give you 10 arrows, on
the house!
Talk42:
<sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:Greeting_00>Now it's time to hop in the cart!


This is a self-service kinda joint. So you'll
be the one to put the cart on the tracks.
Talk59:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Hey, Kabetta! What's yer face doin'?!
Get it together!
Talk44:
<sp:3:0:2:0200>It's <clr:0000>20 rupees <clr:ffff>if ya just wanna play. For
<clr:0000>50 rupees<clr:ffff>, you get 10 arrows too.
Talk30:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:TalkPositive_01>To keep things fair, you'll be ridin' <clr:0000>our
dear ol' cart<clr:ffff>. <sp:5:0:0>No outside carts allowed!
Talk45:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Is this about the price? We can't pay
everyone's salaries if we don't charge
for our game!
Talk31:
<sp:3:0:2:0201>Put the cart on the track, get in, and
start smiling!
Talk32: <sp:3:0:2:0201>Hop on out if you're not ready.
Talk47:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Think_00>You're a mine-cart master now. <clr:0000>Heehl <clr:ffff>and
<clr:0000>Kabetta<clr:ffff>'s courses might suit ya better.
Talk48:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Happy_00>If you wanna play our time-trial-style
intermediate course, talk to <clr:0000>Heehl<clr:ffff>.

If you want a warm-up, though, I can
set ya up for the <clr:0000>beginner course<clr:ffff>.
Talk34:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Greeting_01>Then let the game begin!<sp:5:0:0> Wait a second
while I get all the targets set up.
Talk49:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Happy_00>If you wanna play our time-trial-style
intermediate course, talk to <clr:0000>Heehl<clr:ffff>.

If ya want even more excitement, you
can take on the <clr:0000>Death Mountain<clr:ffff> course
<clr:0000>Kabetta <clr:ffff>put together!
But if you're lookin' for a warm-up, I can
set the <clr:0000>beginner course<clr:ffff> up for ya.
Talk35:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Greeting_01>Ya ride a mine cart down the track,
poppin' as many targets as you can
within the time limit.
Talk36:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>If there's anything ya don't understand,
I'm the guy to ask! I'll always answer with
a smile!
Talk21:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:TalkPositive_01>Hey! No getting out of the mine cart!<sp:5:0:0>
You're disqualified!
Talk37: <sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Where are you taking our precious cart?!
Talk22:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:TalkPositive_01>Hey! You can't just leave the cave!<sp:5:1:0>
You're disqualified!
Talk38:
<sp:3:0:2:0201><snd:Think_00>That's our special cart. You only get to
use it if you play our game.
Talk23:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Greeting_00>Your smile still has room to grow.<sp:0:4:0>But lucky for you, we've prepped a
high-speed course geared toward
up-and-comers!
If you're interested, come talk to me
instead of my brother.
Talk24:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:CallFar_01><sp:0:2:2:7d00>Smiiile!<sp:0:2:2:6400>


<sp:3:0:2:0201>Ya wanna smile like this, ya gotta talk
to <clr:0000>Bayge<clr:ffff>!
Talk10:
<sp:3:0:2:0901>Here's your prize, offered up with the
biggest of smiles!
Talk27:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:TalkPositive_00>Game over!


Next time you take a crack at this, be sure
to stay in the cave.
Talk28:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>Brought to you by the one and
only YunoboCo!
Talk13:
<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Happy_00>Mine-Cart Land, Mine-Cart Land!<sp:0:4:0>Every ride is always grand!<sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:0:4:0>Oh, ask me if there's anything you
don't understand!
Talk14:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Bad luck, huh? Sometimes that happens.


That said...<sp:5:1:0>
Talk81:
<sp:3:0:2:0901>You'll wanna use arrows to pop the
targets. <sp:5:0:0>Just <clr:0000>don't get out of the
cart or you'll be disqualified<clr:ffff>.
Hit all the targets you can before the time
runs out!
Talk82:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:TalkPositive_01>I want ya to see how fun our game is,
so I'll give you one more play, on us.<sp:5:0:0>

Whaddaya say?
Talk09:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Happy_01>You may not have won, but you should
still smile!

I bet we just set up the targets
wrong. Besides...
Talk70:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Greeting_01>From mornin' till mornin', it's smiiiles all
the time!

Thank you for visiting Mine-Cart Land,
presented by the good-hearted Gorons
at YunoboCo.
Talk71:
<sp:3:0:2:0901>You'll wanna use arrows to pop the
targets. <sp:5:0:0>Oh, and <clr:0000>don't leave the cart
or game's over<clr:ffff>.
Pop <clr:0000><sp:2:2:42:3c0047006f0072006f006e005f004d0069006e006900470061006d0065005f00300031005f00500061007300730069006e006700530063006f0072006500ffff00cd> or more<clr:ffff> targets before the time
runs out, and you win!
Talk72:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Where're ya goin'? <sp:5:0:0>The game's over
if ya leave!
Talk73:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad_00>That's too bad. Come by and try
again sometime!
Talk61:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice_00>Not in front of the customer, Brothers!
Less bickering, more smiling!
Talk76:
<snd:QuestionNormal>Huh? <sp:5:0:0>I get why you'd wanna play my
course again, but you should be focusing
on Heehl's right now!
Talk62:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy_00>OK. Let's take it from the top.
Ready, and...
Talk77:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:TalkPositive_00>That's the end of the game!


Next time you play, try not to fall out of
the mine cart.
Talk63:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Think_00>Are their faces scaring you? <sp:5:0:0>Sorry
about that.

They're trying to smile, really!


<snd:Ease_01>It's just...President Yunobo entrusted us
with running Mine-Cart Land. And they're
really pumped about all this.
But maybe they're<sp:5:0:0> a little too pumped...
Talk78:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Where are you goin'? The game's over
if ya leave!

Or do ya wanna quit?
Talk64:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_00>Kabetta, your face... You're doing it again!


<sp:3:0:2:0000>You're gonna scare away the customer.
Look at me. Ya gotta smile...<sp:5:1:0>
Talk79:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:Think_00>The better prepared you are, the more
fun you're gonna have!

You should try lots of different types of
bows! They're real game changers!
Talk50:
<sp:3:0:2:0200>You stopped partway through last time,
so I'll give ya the next ride for free!<sp:5:0:0>
Talk66:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy_00>Anyway, if you wanna give the game a
shot, go talk to <clr:0000>Bayge<clr:ffff>.

<sp:3:0:2:0801>I know he looks kinda intimidating, but
he's harmless, I swear.
